default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the olive oil in a wok or large frying pan, add the onion and red pepper and stir fry for 3-4 minutes until softened.
Add the garlic and cook for one minute, then add the beansprouts and cook for a further minute.
Add the herbs, season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper and stir.
To serve, place into a serving dish.
title: Stir-fried beansprouts with peppers and herbs
